sections.heading: Tax exemption9-625.Tax exemptionAn eligible city is regarded as performing a governmental function in carrying out the purposes of this chapter and the eligible project is considered to be municipal property for the purposes of article IX, section 2, Constitution of Arizona
sections.text: Tax exemption9-625.Tax exemptionAn eligible city is regarded as performing a governmental function in carrying out the purposes of this chapter and the eligible project is considered to be municipal property for the purposes of article IX, section 2, Constitution of Arizona.
